MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Sinclair Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Our engineers are in the final process of connecting the generator to restore electricity supplies.  This has taken longer than expected but they now expect the power to be restored by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55pm on 15th December 2020.
